text: A Palace for Sale (Spanish: Se vende un palacio) is a 1942 Spanish comedy film directed by Ladislao Vajda and starring Roberto Rey, Mary Santamaría and José Nieto. It was the Hungarian-born director's first film in Spain, where he was to settle and become a leading filmmaker.D'Lugo p.207 ==Cast== * Roberto Rey * Mary Santamaría * José Nieto * Manolo Morán * Julia Lajos * María Brú * Manuel Arbó * María Luisa Gerona * Fernando Fernán Gómez == References == ==Bibliography== * D'Lugo, Marvin. Guide to the Cinema of Spain. Greenwood Publishing, 2007. == External links == * Category:1942 films Category:Spanish films Category:Spanish comedy films Category:1942 comedy films Category:Spanish-language films Category:Films directed by Ladislao Vajda Category:Films scored by Jesús García Leoz Category:Spanish black-and-white films
title: A Palace for Sale
